sheet.text: Hey, we got to Primp Town much quicker than I expected!
It was convenient we found a path leading right here.
Heh... I told ya I knew the way!
So this is Primp... And it IS overrun with Tetriminos.
Pipi! Pipi-Pipi!
I agree, O. This is definitely the strangest world we've ever seen.
Yep! Welcome home!
It's tons o' fun here! Wish we had time to go sightseeing!
...But we really ARE overrun with Tetriminos...!
Th-This place is a mess...
Well, then let's get to work, team!
First up, Tetrimino cleaning duty.
And second, we figure out why this is happening.
Not to go in reverse order... but I can tell you why this is happening!
Oh no! It's him!
It's the Dark Prince!
Whahaha!
Sounds like my precious Arly and my precious Carbunny need help.
Enter... me! The strong, strapping, madcapping monarch of the dark!
The majestificent... ... ...Dark Prince... ...at... ... ...your service...!
NO THANK YOU!
GU! GU-GU!
Huh!? H-H-Hey, I-I wasn't done with my introduction yet.
Yes, you were!
I knew we'd find YOU here...
*princely chuckle*
So you want to know why the Tetriminos are hitting Primp, huh?
Well, listen up.
Two very different dimensions seem to be merging into one.
...And thus, it's transforming both worlds.
And somehow, a few people have gone a little kooky from this.
But if you beat them at Puyo Puyo and Tetris, you might cure them.
And now... to reveal who is behind the merging of the worlds... Mwahaha...
*sigh* Let me guess.
It's you, right?
H-Huh!?
You probably wanted to have some fun, is that it?
You got bored, so you caused a whole bunch of chaos. Big whoop.
Gugu! Gugu!
Wh-What!? You suspect ME of all people...?
It's definitely just the sort of evil plan YOU would concoct.
I'm flattered! But please believe me, Arly, it wasn't me this time.
No matter where I travel to...
No matter what, you're always there to cause trouble.
Of course I don't believe you're innocent!
Gu-Gu-Gu!
I'm wounded by your cruel, cruel finger-pointing.
*princely cry* I am the victim here! You two are ganging up upon me!
Whoa... I think he's actually crying!
Say, how 'bout we use this chance to clear some Tetriminos?
I'm way ahead of you.
Time for your punishment!
GU~GU~GU~GUGUGU!
Wahhh! I promise! I promise! It wasn't me this time!
Hmph! You're all a bunch of meanie-pants!
He's getting away!
Gugugu!
You guys stay here. Me and Carby'll track him down.
He was acting so strange just now...
I'm worried! See you all later!
Hey! Dark Prince! Wait up!
Gu-Gu!
Status report.
Ringo, what in the universe did we just observe?
Eh, don't worry about it.
Arle's on the job, so it should turn out alright...ish!
That sounds reassuring.
C'mon, we got some inspectigating to do!
I think we should start at the Magic School.
That's where I left the others.
Maybe they found somethin' out since I left!
Wh-Who's there...!?
No! ...Stay back! BACK!
Someone's up ahead...
And I'd say he looks pretty frightened.
Huh? It's Klug!
Wh-What's wrong?
Oh! Hello there, Amitie.
N-N-N-Nothing important... It's just...
Well, she was acting... s-stranger than normal...
I tried to reason with her... but she spooked me! I ran off kicking and screaming.
Er, I mean... I WALKED off, at an average pace, entirely of my own accord.
Ringo, who's that?
Pi-Pi...?
Oh, that's Klug, one of Amitie's friends.
Start over. Who scared you away?
H-Hey! I didn't get scared! Let's, uh... let's keep our facts straight.
If you're going to twist my words, maybe I don't want to answer your questions.
Is this REALLY the time to get defensive?
*evil laugh*
Oh no! *tremble* It's her!
Oh.
So you came.
Feli...!
I feel so alive.
The two worlds are becoming one...
Hehehe... I hope you don't stand in my way.
Hyah...!
Meep!
Klug, don't hide behind me!
...'C-'C-'C-'Cause now I need s-someone to h-hide behind!
Everything is so chaotic. What's going on?
Didn't that Dark Prince fellow mention this?
This girl is acting kooky, right? She's not herself.
So that means we should battle her, correct?
Huh? You're right!
I'll look after Amitie n' Klug.
Ya got this, Ringo?
Leave her to me.
Alright, Ringo, you can do this... You can do this...
YOU! Little Miss Spookyface! I'm talkin' to you!
Hurrwgh...!?
I hope you're ready...
Because now it's time... to deal with ME!
AND I WANNA BATTLE!
HYAAAAAH!
Mission accomplished!
...Think she'll return to normal now?
Wh-What are you doing here...?
You'd better not mess with me.
Hyah!
Oh no! I can't tell if it worked!
Hey, Feli, ya okay?
Lemres...?
I'm happy to see you all, but...
H-Hey, where ARE we?
And what am I doing here...?
Hey, I think she's comin' back to normal.
It's the cute, cuddly Feli we all know n' love...!
*nervous giggle*
Hey! Not cool! You just started acting strange out of nowhere.
And you chased me and scared me and... and... you bullied me!
Great, you guys brought Four-Eyes with you.
Why are YOU here...?
Didn't I tell you to stay away from me?
What!?
Oh boy, there they go... just like old times.
I'll handle these two.
Y'all head on over to the Magic School, 'kay?
You got it! I'm still worried about Raffina.
C'mon, let's hurry!
Hold up, head count!
We're coming. Don't forget about us!
Pi-Pipipi-Pipi-Pi!
Step aside.
Er... what?
Why?
*evil laugh*
So you will not step aside then?
There's an unnatural energy in you...
Shouldn't you also embrace the coming chaos?
Huh?
Raffina, that's a bad idea.
You need a new plan.
People don't like chaos.
Well then, in that case...
I shall have to take you out of the picture.
NO!
*pant* ...Raf... *pant* ...I finally tracked... *pant*
Grr... You finally tracked me down.
*wheeze*
We should... have... *pant* ...have a... *gargle*
You look out of breath.
You wanna battle, huh? ...Need me to start it?
*ahem* Amitie! Raffina!
Time to battle! *crowd-gone-wild cheer*
Huh?
Raffina, are you all better now?
Stop being mean, okay!?
Amitie...? Wh-Why are you yelling at me?
How about we just use our indoor voices a bit? 'Kay thanks.
Oh...! I'm so happy~!
You're back to your usual, MILDLY tolerable unpleasantness!
Excuse you...? Someone's being a bit snappy today...!
Amitie!?
*pant* Found you!
You took off so fast, we were worried we'd lost you.
But it looks like you've solved the problem on your own!
You can say that again!
But, um... Whew!
Is something wrong?
Whoa... everything's spinning...
I think she's gonna faint.
N-No, I'm not.
You need rest.
I'm... I'm fine...
Hey, you can catch up with me and Tee later, okay?
Why don't you get a little shut-eye first? Sig, will you watch her?
No, no I'm fine...! Maybe I'll just... *yawn* ...get a little shut-eye first...
Thank you, Sig.
*yawn* Good luck, Ringo.
Mind your Z's and Q's!
Hm...
Carby, I don't see the Dark Prince anywhere!
Gu-Gugu...
Maybe two pairs of eyes isn't enough.
I know just the person to help!
Gugu...?
Are you ready?
HEY! CREEPER!
HELLO...!?
Seriously?
I thought for sure that would do it.
Hey! Who are you calling a creeper?
Whoa!
He actually came when I called!
I am Schezo the dark mage.
And I demand you stop screaming "creeper" at once!
I prefer you to scream my name when we're together.
Um... That's...
I'm not sure you're helping your case much.
Hey, you are besmirching my honor!
I don't take that lightly.
There are less besmirch-y ways to summon me, you know!
Are you... angry at me?
What do you think!?
You expect me to answer to "creeper" like it's no big deal?
The time has come for me to clear my reputation... by assaulting this young girl!
So what'd you need me for, anyhow?
We're looking for the Dark Prince.
Is he wrongdoing again?
He's the reason these Tetriminos are falling on Primp Town!
And also, that's causing Rulue to act kinda kooky.
Gu-Gu-Gugu...
Rulue... acting kooky, you say?
I'm going to teach that Dark Prince a lesson he won't forget!
I don't mean to be a Prince's Advocate, but are you sure he's to blame?
"Princess Advocate"? What are you even saying...? Stop being weird.
Urgh! Never mind. Let us find him. We should probe the area!
Really!? You'll help us!? --Hey, wait up!
Gu-Gugu!
*evil laugh*
Shoosh! It's Rulue...
Arle, you said she's being kooky, right?
Yep-siree! And the Dark Prince is behind it!
Nope-siree. Sorry.
Huh!?
The Dark Prince is not our foe this time.
Feel her magic aura... Embrace your training.
That power is not of this world.
So... what are you saying?
Someone--or something--else is making her act this way.
*gasp* OH NO!
B-But I was so cruel to the Dark Prince earlier!
Meh! He probably deserved it anyhow.
Let us focus on Rulue. We should advance on her slowly...
You stay put, while I make advances on her!
A-Are you hatching some brilliant gameplan?
Just watch and learn...
Rulue!
*evil laugh, continued*
You're interrupting my laugh and my master plan.
I will turn this dimension into smithereens!
Tsk! Tsk! It's a good thing HE hasn't seen you like this...
You know interdimensional chaos is NOT what he looks for in a girl...
Tsk! Tsk! Your crush, the Dark Prince, would be so disappointed.
Hmph! This isn't intended to be a brilliant gameplan or something, is it?
Because it is far from brilliant.
Rulue loves the Dark Prince~! Rulue loves the Dark Prince~!
Ungh...
Huh!? It's... It's working!
Everyone...!
Rulue loves the Dark Prince~! Rulue loves the Dark Prince~!
Gugu~Gugu~Gu~Gu~! Gugu~Gugu~Gu~Gu~!
Urgh...! Dimensions... chaos... smithereens... No...!
Rulue loves the Dark Prince~!
Chaos and darkness... Darkness... Dark Prince... Dark Prince...
I'M IN LOVE WITH THE DARK PRINCE!
Whoa! W-We cured her! ...Without needing to fight!
That's a new precedent! I guess love really does conquer all.
Grr... ARLE!
How DARE you tease me and trivialize matters of the heart!
*gulp* Um, Schezo started it...
No one mocks Lady Rulue and escapes in one piece.
...Not without a battle!
Why me...?
After all that, we have to battle her ANYHOW!
Whew!
My mind feels so... so... clear now.
How'd I get here? What happened...?
Wow, I never realized you were so ga-ga for the Dark Prince.
You're crazy for him, huh?
And why not!? He's strong, strapping, and madcapping...!
Look, Carby! She's her old self again!
Gu-Gugu!
Are you telling me you don't agree?
His radiant nobility, his overwhelming fragrance...
A tip-top trendsetter, from his tippy-horns to his tippy-toes!
Oh boy... This could be a while.
Schezo, I'm leaving her with you.
What!? And you think I don't have anything better to do...?
What? You don't have anything better to do? Great!
Carby, let's push onward!
Gu~Gu~GUGU~!
W-Wait... Don't I get a say in this?
Hey! Are you even listening? FINE! I'll start over! *ahem* "His radiant nobility..."
MAKE IT STOP! MAKE IT STOP!
...And then there's his shimmering, emerald locks...
Those magnelegantly curved horns... piercing the sky...
*bored yawn*
I forget, did I describe the way his smile makes me shiver...?
Yes. Twice now.
*swoon* Then, I'll describe it a third time for you...!
Ribbit! ♪ Ribbit! ♪
Huh? Hey, it's Donguri Gaeru! *squee!*
Onion! ♪ Onion! ♪
Wa-hey there, Onion Pixie! *double-squee!*
And how are you two little cuties doing~?
HEY! Excuuuse me. I was describing things here...!
Well, just stop!
I've heard about the curvature of his horns all morning!
I'm trying to talk to my adorable friends, and you won't shut your lousy yap!
Did you just say to me what I THINK you just said to me!?
Look, you're fine. Crisis over. I'm going to go train for a bit.
Alone! No lovesick rambling, no monologues! And definitely, no more horn curvatures!
Precious Arly... Precious Carbunny...
I forgive them... I forgive them NOT... I forgive them...
Looks like we found the Dark Prince before Arle did.
And he's... crying? And totally butchering those flower petals!
I've seen this before. He's... broken inside!
Pipipipi...?
Why are we stopping, Ringo?
Didn't you say before, we need to interrogate him?
I'll handle this.
No, wait, maybe... maybe he...
Hey, you! Dark Prince.
*princely broil*
And who are you...?
My name's Tee.
I'm friends with Arle.
A-A-A-Arly...?
Tee, wait...! No!
You should NOT mention that name right now...!
Huh? Why?
YOU'RE the one who poisoned my beloved Arly against me!
P-Poisoned your... "beloved"!?
Save your breath! You'll need it in the Puyo Underworld!
AMBUSH BATTLE!
Meep!
Impressive, boy. Indeed, quite impressive indeed! ...Quite!
If that had been anything but a Tetris battle, I would've lost.
Ha! Now, I shall come at you with my FULL STRENGTH!
A rematch? But that's... that's... that's unheard of!
Dark Prince! There you are!
GU-GU!
Oh my! It's Arly! And Carbunny!
I want to apologize for earlier. I was really horrible to you.
What, THAT!? Psh! Don't sweat it!
Talk about a speedy recovery!
Arle, what are you saying!?
Does this mean the Dark Prince isn't to blame...?
That's right~!
I learned some things when we ran into Rulue and Schezo!
Ringo, Arle, I'm baaack~!
Hey, gang, it's Amitie!
Looks like we all found each other.
Hey, Dark Prince, do you still wanna tell us who's to blame?
Well, just think about it.
Someone is behind merging the dimensions.
So they must be powerful, right?
BUT! They must also be able to travel between dimensions.
Someone who travels between dimensions?
Do we know someone like that?
He's laughing at you, beyond the clouds.
It's too high for you to ever reach. Not in a million years.
Alas, I'm afraid you'd need... a starship.
Good news! We got one of those!
WHAT!? You've already got one!? When did that happen!?
Yep, and she's all fixed up by now, I'm sure!
Well then, in that case, you'll get there just fine.
BUT ALAS! I cannot join you. My place is here, in this world.
Someone must finish clearing all these Tetriminos.
And someone must help rebuild... Even if it means all by his princely self...
Great! I'm sure you'll handle it. Let's go, everyone else!
Gugu~!
Pipi~!
